original_text: But God has helped me every day, even until today. So now I stand here and I can tell you what is true. I say the same thing to people who are very important and to people who are not important. I am telling you the same things that Moses and God's other prophets wrote about. They also said that these things would happen.
korean_text: 하나님의 도우심을 받아 내가 오늘까지 서서 높고 낮은 사람 앞에서 증언하는 것은 선지자들과 모세가 반드시 되리라고 말한 것밖에 없으니

sentences.original_text: But God has helped me every day
and I can tell you what is true
sentences.korean_translation: 진실인 것을 여러분에게 말할 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: I say the same thing to people who are very important
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 매우 중요한 사람들에게도 똑같은 말을 합니다

sentences.original_text: and to people who are not important
I am telling you the same things
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 여러분에게 똑같은 것들을 말하고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: that Moses and God's other prophets wrote about
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들은 모세와 하나님의 다른 예언자들이 기록한 것들입니다

sentences.original_text: They also said that these things would happen
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 역시 이런 일들이 일어날 것이라고 말했습니다
